You've probably heard about Carpal Tunnel Syndrome. It's a common condition that causes pain, numbness and tingling in the hand and arms. Though it's caused by several risk factors, you'll probably find yourself guilty in one: heavy use of computer mouse and awkward working postures of the hand and wrist. That is why this Sinji Vertical Ergonomic Mouse has a patented shape that supports the hand in an upright neutral position so that the rotation in the lower arm is reduced, and the arm is more relaxed. item.title: Molcajete with Tortilla Basket for $54
item.description:
Expires April 18, 2120 23:59 PST
Buy now and get 10% off





KEY FEATURES

The molcajete is a century-old mortar and pestle used by Mexican cooks. Its rough surface is made entirely of volcanic stone, ideal for grinding and releasing flavorful oils from vegetables and spices. Like cast-iron, your molcajete bowl can go in the oven, retain heat for an hour, and it picks up flavors over time, continually enhancing the foods youâre working with. Perfect for salsa, guacamole, queso, mole, and more.

Each molcajete is packed in a tortilla basket made of handwoven palm leaves. Each one is unique in color and pattern. You can use the basket for corn chips, or tortillas.

Recommended Curing Process Before First Use

  1. Rinse the molcajete with water (or let soak in water overnight), then clean with a wire brush, or toothbrush, to get rid of surface debris and dust
  2. Place enough rice to make an even layer across the bottom of the molcajete
  3. Pour in about a tablespoon of water, then use the pestle to work the rice up and around the entire inner surface of the molcajete until the rice has formed a grey paste
  4. Rinse out the paste, and repeat the rice grinding until the resulting paste is no longer grey
  5. You can then repeat with garlic, onion, cumin seeds, rock salt, or cilantro to add a seasoned flavor before your first use

PRODUCT SPECS

Specs

  • Materials: volcanic rock, palm
  • Size: 7" diameter
  • Rough-surface for grinding
  • Oven-safe & retains heat
  • Picks up flavors over time
  • With handwoven tortilla basket

Includes

  • Tortilla Basket
  • Insert with Cleaning Instructions, History & Recipe Ideas

What Does "Remanufactured" Mean?

When a product is Factory Remanufactured, it is tested and checked to operate as a brand new item should. Many times it is as simple as the box being opened by mistake or for quality checks. Once the box has been opened companies cannot legally sell these items as New. Each item is inspected, rerun down the production line and triple checked for quality before being shipped.

item.description:

KEY FEATURES

A global, industry-recognized professional system, Lean uses many tools to implement production and efficiency methods. This course provides you with 1- to 2-hour modules for the top 25 Lean tools from Fishbone and 5S Training to Value Stream Map and Visual Management. With 40 hours of instruction, this course will help you understand each tool and how valuable it is with the whole Lean implementation model.

Included Courses

  • 5 Whys & Fishbone Diagram Training and Certificate: Build your problem-solving skills by using the "5 whys" method & Fishbone Cause-Effect diagram
  • 5S Training & Certificate: Create & maintain an intuitive workspace using the 5S organization technique
  • 8 Wastes Training & Certificate: Eliminate non value-adding steps in a process
  • A3 Coaching Training & Certificate: Make it easier for leaders or coaches to review a problem solver's work
  • A3 Training & Certificate: Practice the use of A3s to force project teams to focus their efforts
  • Check Sheets Training & Certificate: Effectively identify defect frequency, patterns of events, & possible defect causes
  • Control Charts Training & Certificate: Enhance the understanding of process variation to reduce special cause variation & improve ongoing process performance
  • FMEA Training & Certificate: Identify & quantify the influence of potential failures in a process
  • Histogram Training & Certificate: Show the distribution of values produced by a process
  • Kanbans & Supermarkets Training and Certificate: Use a pull system to stock materials according to demand
  • Leader Huddle Meetings Training & Certificate: Work from a visual of organizational metrics
  • Leader Process Walks Training & Certificate: Build process focus & leverage visual management tools
  • Leader Standard Work Training & Certificate: Learn the actions, behaviors, & tools that leaders use to build and sustain a Lean Culture
  • Leader Task Boards Training & Certificate: Monitor task completion at a glance using visual check systems
  • Mistake-Proofing (Poka-yoke) Training & Certificate: Eliminate defects by preventing human errors before they occure or create alarms to warn of potential defects
  • PDCA Training & Certificate: Understand the Plan Do Study Act methodology for problem-solving
  • Process Performance Boards Training & Certificate: Visually track people, quality, delivery, cost, and process improvement
  • Process Walk (aka Gemba Walk) Training & Certificate: Gain a comprehensive understanding of a process w/ a series of structured, on-site interviews
  • Process Walk Facilitation Training & Certificate: Focus on detail such as process time, wait time, defect rates, root causes, & other information that can lead to targeted improvements
  • Project Charter Training & Certificate: Clarify process issue being addressed, the reason for addressing it, & what "success" looks like for those working on it
  • SIPOC Training & Certificate: Understand the high-level view of a process among Suppliers, Inputs, Process, Outputs, & Customers
  • Standard Work Training & Certificate: Address the problem of process participants developing their own preferred ways of completing any given task
  • Swimlane Map Training & Certificate: Separate process into lanes that represent different functions, departments, or individuals
  • Value Stream Map Training & Certificate: Understand the flow of steps, delays, & information required to deliver a product or service to the customers
  • Visual Management Training & Certificate: Identify units & materials, update people on process status, show how the process works, and provide a visible process plan for future steps

What Does Refurbished Mean?

When a product is Factory Remanufactured, it is tested and checked to operate as a brand new item should. Many times it is as simple as the box being opened by mistake or for quality checks. Once the box has been opened companies cannot legally sell these items as New. Each item is inspected, rerun down the production line and triple checked for quality before being shipped.
